title: Essential Cell Biology 3rd edition Alberts c2010 textbook
description:
Essential Cell Biology, 3rd Edition (c2010), textbook by Bruce Alberts, Dennis Bray, Karen Hopkin, Alexander Johnson, Julian Lewis, Martin Raff, Keith Roberts and Peter Walter.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.garlandscience.com/product/isbn/9780815341291" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.garlandscience.com/product/isbn/9780815341291</a>
Table of Contents:
  01. Introduction to Cells
  02. Chemical Components of Cells
  03. Energy, Catalysis, and Biosynthesis
  04. Protein Structure and Function
  05. DNA and Chromosomes
  06. DNA Replication, Repair, and Recombination
  07. From DNA to Protein: How Cells Read the Genome
  08. Control of Gene Expression
  09. How Genes and Genomes Evolve
  10. Manipulating Genes and Cells
  11. Membrane Structure
  12. Membrane Transport
  13. How Cells Obtain Energy from Food
  14. Energy Generation in Mitochondria and Chloroplasts
  15. Intracellular Compartments and Transport
  16. Cell Communication
  17. Cytoskeleton
  18. The Cell Division Cycle
  19. Sex and Genetics
  20. Tissues and Cancer
